body:
I get so triggered sometimes by the unPC stuff people say these days bros, like we seriously need to fix this. I know that not everyone will choose to be PC, the idiots, but for the time being I need a safe space in which I don't get triggered. Like people are referring to businesspeople as businessmen, that's really not PC bros it makes me so mad. Someone please fix this, we need to be the change we want to see in the world bros. 
Thanks bros, means a lot.

replies.body:
Saying 'k' is a micro-aggression against oppressed peoples of the world who do not have the ability nor the right to express their opinion on a subject like we do. By saying so little you are insulting those without freedom of speech.

Check your privilege

replies.body:
OK? You think the situation is okay bro? There are minorities out there who can't even say okay because their throats are too dry cos they're not able to get water. How is that okay bro? How can you be so ignorant bro? Unless you mean okay as in the response to the post bro, which is cool I guess bro, except that you didn't say anything else bro. How can you not exercise your freedom of speech bro? Think of the periphery countries which systematically deny that right bro. Use your rights bro, show your gratitude for your white cisgender middle class upbringing bro. But check that privilege bro, otherwise you're no worse than the oppressors bro.
Also, staff, bros we need a PC chat so cultural awareness of such topics can be shared amongst the world and the community, so incidents like this do not occur bro, and I don't get triggered. We need the safe space bros. 
Thanks bros.
